website_summaries.verdict: This trainer provides an extremely realistic ride and a no-leak guarantee.
pros: No-leak guarantee included in lifetime warranty

customer_reviews.title: LOUD!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so ridiculously loud I had the manager of my condo was calling within 5 min of first use to ask me what the hell I was doing. it sounded like the building was falling down... and this condo is all concrete construction! Unless I got a bad unit, this thing is useless for condo or apt use... Returning mine
customer_reviews.author: Choppahead

customer_reviews.title: Pretty quiet for a single family house and has a good road feel.  DON'T USE IN APT!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty quiet for a single family house and has a good road feel. I use it while watching baseball. I can hear the announcers easily. This might not be good for a professional rider. There might not be enough resistance. I biked to work for most of my life but I am not a professional. I don't get on the road anymore unless it is a closed circuit. I don't trust the cell phone users. I use this inside to get bike exercise. DON'T USE THIS IF YOU LIVE IN AN APT! You will drive your downstairs neighbors nuts, maybe the upstairs neighbors as well. It would be so rude.
customer_reviews.author: HerMan

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: This item is falsely advertised. I expected to be able to use the inRide App or the kinetic fit app as is advertised by the pictures on this product however this version is not the smart series and does not come with a sensor. Extremely disappointed in the advertising. Very misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Very solid unit!  Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: After having used this trainer for a few months almost on a daily basis for 60 to 120 minute rides, I am pretty happy with it. One word of caution, don't get too crazy on this unit, which i just recently did going pretty hard on my bike, which actually caused the unit to start to come over, but it really was my fault! Just mentioning it so you are aware. After at least 100 hours of constant training on this Kinetic trainer, i have had zero problems, other than the "operator initiated issue" as previously noted. I am pretty happy with my trainer.
customer_reviews.author: Washington DC shopper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Deal
customer_reviews.text: We did a lot of research before buying this and we're glad we did. It isn't nearly as expensive as a lot of other units out there but that doesn't mean it's cheap, it isn't. This is one solid trainer. I weight 220 and it has been working flawlessly for me. If you have reservations about this trainer and you don't care about bells & whistles, this is the one for you. BTW you do NOT need to use a quick release axle. We are using the existing axle with the 5/8"(?) nuts on the ends and it fit the unit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Sparkz

customer_reviews.title: Solid, quiet and easy to set up!
customer_reviews.text: Great trainer! Solid, easy to set up and works exactly as described! Makes no more noise than a small electric fan would make. There are reviews here that complain it makes a lot of noise in apartments/condos but I have to believe those people are using it on a hardwood or tile floor with downstair neighbors. I'm on the 3rd floor and use mine in a carpeted room along with the Kinetic mat I bought separately. My neighbor below me says she can't hear a thing.
customer_reviews.author: T. Rickert

customer_reviews.title: no support whatsoever - they don't even try - , noisy as heck DON'T BUY THIS !!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The wattmeter that you need to buy separately 1) impossible to tell which way to insert the battery 2) not enough room to mount it the way it needs to be 3) no clear way to connect to Bluetooth with your phone 4) the app is of course unusable 5) the support is non-existent
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item, does exactly what it is supposed to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great item, does exactly what it is supposed to do. I'm a weekend warrior, but ride pretty consistently so being able to ride in inclement weather is great and this trainer delivers a consistently good workout. In my opinion it is fairly quiet. Setting up the bike on the trainer was easy. I set up a road bike on it that I rarely ride any more, and it works great. The shipper lost the first one Amazon sent, but the second one arrived in new condition without issue. Amazon was great once I alerted them that it had "disappeared" somewhere in the process and promptly sent a replacement. I would highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Mike F

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for my Elliptigo
customer_reviews.text: With bike trainers, you get what you pay for. This is a quality product. No regrets. I tried a cheaper trainer for my elliptigo (one that uses gravity to rest the tire on the roller) - bad idea. It generated too much friction resulting in three damaged back tires. If you have an Elliptigo, choose this one . Just realize you need the small wheel adaptor too.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Parent working out
customer_reviews.text: This product I like quite a bit. Especially if you have kids. During nap times working out can be essential since late nights before they head to bed things get crazy and you just want to sleep. This will get you going. The product is great for that or just keeping in shape. Quite and very sturdy. I researched quite a few of these. I'm no expert but I can tell you that I'm extremely satisfied. I used to cycle on a daily basis and now this is helping me get back into the flow of things. Anything else I can assist anyone with feel free to ask.
customer_reviews.author: Teemosee

customer_reviews.title: Quality, stable, quiet trainer with road 'feel'
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help my recovery from a broken femur I suffered last December. I researched a ton, and this seemed the best trainer and value. I've not been disappointed at all! I'm a month from being cleared to ride the bike trails again, and this trainer has me in decent condition with much of my strength back to do so. This is STABLE, quiet, well made, and gives a real 'road feel' with nice progressive resistance too. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jim in Tampa

customer_reviews.title: Fully satisfied with its performance and I think you will be too
customer_reviews.text: Purchased December 2014 from Amazon. This trainer is a great product. I'm fully satisfied with its performance and I think you will be too. I recommend it without reservation. I cannot attest to the quality of Kurt Kinetic customer service. This product is so good I haven't needed any customer service assistance. Oh, lifetime warranty. Need I say more.
customer_reviews.author: Standard Deviation

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my husband after a car accident sidelined him. He loves it! According to him, it mimics road conditions well, is a smooth ride, and hasn't caused any noticeable tire wear. It's a little loud for inside use if we both want to watch tv--I'd say it's about as loud as an average vacuum cleaner when you really get going--but putting a mat underneath it reduced vibrations and catches sweat. This is a great option for when you can't get on the road, and I don't mind having it inside till we can make space in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Steelman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent design and durable build
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect attachement for my bike to keep my "rides" going all winter long! Super easy to set-up, it is clearly well designed for ease of use. This trainer seems well built from nicely manufactured materials. Well worth the price...and it's not cheap, $$$$ wise and product wise!
customer_reviews.author: JDK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and no regrets.
customer_reviews.text: This is a late but real world review. I’ve had it a few years now and I must say, this is far better than I expected. Rock solid and very stable. Costs a little more, but in this case you really do get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Great trainer. Very close to real riding resistance
customer_reviews.text: Great trainer. Very close to real riding resistance, though it seems a bit on the light end for lower speeds.I put a few hundred miles on it in the beginning of the year and it really helped get me back into shape for cycling prior to the weather warming up. I look forward to using it again once the weather starts becoming cooler or otherwise unpleasant to ride in.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Check the product as soon as you receive it
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to my husband. When he finally opened the package we discovered this had been previously purchased/returned and was missing a key piece to attach the bike to the device. The previous purchaser’s invoice was inside the box and stated they returned it for the next level device. By the time we opened and assembled (and realized we received an incomplete product) it was so late after the purchase date to do anything. I wasn’t initially worried about it as I had purchased a “new” item.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Gengenbacher

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra dollars
customer_reviews.text: To date owned for 3 months. Used 3x/week. No mechanical issues. Noise level is similar to youtube videos I watched prior to buying it. To watch TV programs while biking the volume is up to 43 (usually set at 24 and my hearing has gone south as I've gotten older). Easily transportable. Quick release system allows the bike to be quickly installed or detached. From my understanding the 2014 model has a plastic quick release lever, verses the updated metal one, which is a substantial improvement if your looking for longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Perfect trainer for winter months
customer_reviews.text: This is a winner. My husband had been wanting a trainer and was looking at the cheapest to save money. This is his main Christmas present this year and he's so happy with it. Within minutes he had mounted the bike and was riding while enjoying a movie on TV. Very quiet and stable. I'm so glad we decided on this one for him. We will probably get the adapter for smaller wheels so I can use it with my Catrike during cold winter months.
customer_reviews.author: D Redding

customer_reviews.title: Extremely easy setup and use
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy setup and use. The first time use was simply extending the legs and alining the bicycle (and changing the skewer if your bike doesn't have metal one already). A video was available online. One securing point stays in position while the other side has an easy quick release lever for outdoor rides and remounting back on the trainer. For times when not in use fold back the legs and store it under something or lean it against the wall. Surprisingly quite compared to the trainer I had several years ago. I'm happy with my purchase and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: ChillOnLake

customer_reviews.title: Great trainer for me
customer_reviews.text: First indoor trainer and I’ve been very pleased. I added the Bluetooth sensor and it pairs well with many cycling apps. Also added a hearth rate monitor.
customer_reviews.author: K. Tewkesbury

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely buy this again if I had to do it over!
customer_reviews.text: I have loved extending my bike riding into the winter without having to brave the cold. I really don't understand the mechanics as to how it makes it harder and easier as you switch gears, but it does and you can make it as hard or easy as you would like. Seems to be built really well and it is simple to set up. I hate reading directions, but they actually have good ones that don't take long to follow and get it up and riding. Remember to pump up your tires just like you do when you usually ride or eventually it will start slipping on the wheel. That isn't the products fault, of course.
customer_reviews.author: crazeemarchese

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: High build quality. Provides a secure platform for my Trek road bike. Easy to set-up and take down. Although not silent, it is relatively quiet so that I can watch TV or listen to music.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Worth every dollar!
customer_reviews.text: I had to write this review, because I'm the one using the trainer. After having a full knee replacement and that being my fifth surgery, rehabilitation was vital in keeping my knee flexible. This trainer is still running smoothly after 22 months of daily use and I take it with me when I'm going to be in a location for several weeks. I rate it a 10 and it's worth every penny and much cheaper than rehabilitation! You'll get your monies worth if you use it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Winter weather here in the Pacific Northwest isn't the best for outdoor riding
customer_reviews.text: I am training for the Seattle to Portland Ride (STP) in 2016. Winter weather here in the Pacific Northwest isn't the best for outdoor riding, so in order to keep on my training schedule I am using this trainer. I am putting in a few hundred miles a week on this and it keeps working like a champ. Very pleased with solid construction, ease of set-up, and flawless performance. Sure beats riding in the rain and cold!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: No complaints....
customer_reviews.text: I had noted some concerns about quality control in other reviews of this product. Mine arrived on time, seems to be "brand new," and has good quality build and finish. No complaints so far. I've only used it a couple/three times so far and I'm definitely not a competition rider so I doubt I'll over-stress it.
customer_reviews.author: George N.

customer_reviews.title: Great Trainer
customer_reviews.text: Amazing trainer, I was wrestling with getting this one or the Rock & Roll. This one works well for my needs. May splurge and get the Rock & Roll at some point in the future. Solid product, easy on and off, feels very stable even during maximum power workouts. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Adams

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Just tried this, now I wish I hadn't spent four years wobbling on a rickety cheap stand, that would sometimes unexpectedly dump me onto the floor (which is exciting, but doesn't help with a workout).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sold as "NEW" but arrived used which is an Amazon Problem not a Product Problem
customer_reviews.text: I like the Trainer for which I paid more than list price, but it was sold as a new unit and when it arrived, everything about it from the packaging to the Trainer itself, showed this was a used product. Even though it was "Sold By: Amazon.com Services LLC" when it arrived the packaging was from BeeJay's Barely Used Stuff, and there were marks on the Trainer indicating previous use.
customer_reviews.author: David W Beatty

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS PERFECT!!
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought it was easy but realized wow... it starts to feel like you are actually riding on a straight road and pushing yourself! its definitely an odd feeling since you are actually not going anywhere but you get just as tired.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weather is good outside right now so not spending as much time ...
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoying the Road Machine. Weather is good outside right now so not spending as much time on the trainer but can certainly see improvements in my strength when linked to Trainer Road software. This winter should make a big difference when too cold outside.
customer_reviews.author: Page Pittman

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and quiet
customer_reviews.text: This feels pretty much like riding on the road, it's smooth and relatively quiet, and it has enough inertia so it doesn't wind down too fast if you slack off a little on a pedal stroke. It's easy to mount the bike, as well. After several months of riding it, I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Killersax

customer_reviews.title: Can't fault it
customer_reviews.text: I've had this trainer for about 3 weeks now. So far it hasn't let me down. It's really smooth compared to the previous trainer I had. The resistance feels very natural, pretty close to the real thing I'd say. It does make a little bit of noise - but it's more of a swooshing sound and doesn't bother me at all. Great product, highly recommended for anyone serious about getting into shape :)
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Video they linked me to (from their email) was perfect. Although this is my first trainer it doesnt ...
customer_reviews.text: Performs as stated in description. I was confused by not being able to mount the bike onto the trainer but a quick email to the support team and within a couple of hours they straightened me out. Video they linked me to (from their email) was perfect. Although this is my first trainer it doesnt seem to be loud operating at 15mph. Well built, stable .... well my only complaint is that the front wheel stand doesnt come with it. Its a second order item. They should sell it with the trainer.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Turchi

customer_reviews.title: its great for the winter days when I cant ride
customer_reviews.text: its great for the winter days when I cant ride. its quiet and the front tire holder keeps the bike level. the rubber mat that I bought keeps the sweat off the carpet. I recommended this to my brother who rides a lot too.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Chadwell

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Effective. Great value.
customer_reviews.text: I love my kinetic trainer and how it works with my bike. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Roman Ceniceros

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny!
customer_reviews.text: It's not cheap, but it's a quiet trainer and I've been using it almost 7 hours a week since Thanksgiving with no problems. It's quiet, smooth and a piece of cake to figure out and make adjustments with. You get what you pay for and this unit is sturdy and cannot be beat. I've used CycleOps in the past, and those are great - but this is graduate school where CycleOps is undergrad.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan R

customer_reviews.title: Best fluid trainer
customer_reviews.text: Great trainer, relatively quiet (I can watch TV while using it), easy to set up and extremely sturdy (a good thing as I'm a Clyde). The feel of riding this is very realistic compared to riding on the road. I believe this is the best quality fluid trainer you can buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dr_LHA

customer_reviews.title: Quality product .. just not quality inspection on mine.
customer_reviews.text: Love the product .. dislike the surface rust on black piece that tensioning screw goes thru last. Still giving it 5 stars .. but would like the $5 replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Terv Lover

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations and that is rare.
customer_reviews.text: With power meter, it exceeded my expectations. Solid build, stable, easy to use and very quiet with a trainer tire.
customer_reviews.author: James R Dennis

customer_reviews.title: this is awesome. i wish i wouldn't have waited so long
customer_reviews.text: this is awesome. i wish i wouldn't have waited so long. it is quiet. especially when compared to the noise level of cheaper brands. tread on the tire will increase the noise level. so, the balder, or 'slicker' the quieter.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Name

customer_reviews.title: Life changing
customer_reviews.text: I've never written a review for a product before, but this item has changed my life. It's just like riding my bike on the street. Resistance feels natural and it's easy to use. This product will definitely keep me in shape during the winter and ready to hit the streets as soon as Spring comes!
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bike trainer
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. I reviewed many trainers before purchasing this one. Easy bike attachment. Quiet, well built and sturdy. I didn't get the Smart model because I have a bike computer which works great with this.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: This product was exactly as described and rated. I'm enjoying it very much.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the trainer with my bike to rehab my knee after tibial plateau reconstruction. It has allowed me to exercise and deepen the degree of bend in my knee without the worry of possibly wrecking and causing any further damage to my leg.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Very realistic road feel
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for about 5 weeks and got it to help train during the off season to help w/ pedal technique and efficiency. This trainer does have a very realistic resistance that is progressive. Faster you pedal the more difficult it becomes to sustain. I would say that the holding 23mph for 30 min feels a bit more difficult that what in normally does on the road with no wind. 23 on the trainer feels a bit more like doing 23 into a headwind on the road. Fairly quiet considering my house has tile floors throughout.
customer_reviews.author: raistlon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for cold winter places. Easy to set up, get on it & ride.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly for me.
customer_reviews.text: Quiet enough on a concrete floor to watch TV. Sturdy, but also easy to fold up and store. Well designed. Broad range of resistances possible by changing gears. (I use it with Wahoo cadence/speed/HR monitors.)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for my stationary biking and product is durable and heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Wise Buyer

customer_reviews.title: i love the easy setup
customer_reviews.text: i love the easy setup, the clean design, and it just works well. This is what good design means. You don't notice it, because there aren't any problems. it just does what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: There are other trainers out there and there are rollers that give you a completely different indoor ride. However, I bought this for the sole purpose of getting some mountain bike workouts during the winter months. This trainer gives you the ability to work through your gears and I actually find myself riding harder on this than I do outside. It meets all of my expectations and I am very satisfied that I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Dunbar

customer_reviews.title: It has a realistic road feel and provides a good workout. I was surprised at how narrow the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very solid piece of equipment. This trainer is stable, well built, and reasonably quiet. It has a realistic road feel and provides a good workout. I was surprised at how narrow the band of resistance is; most of my training is between two gears, both mid-range on the large front sprocket, the equivalent of a brisk pace on level ground. Exceeds expectations, and I use it more often than I thought I would to stay in training during the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Bill T

customer_reviews.title: Smooth as butter
customer_reviews.text: First one only trainer have ever used. Had it about three weeks now and I use it everyday. The scewer it came with eas simple to install. I use it with my mountain bike and I love it. I thought I was going to have to buy a different tire for the rear but after using it, I reallize it would make much difference it rolls smooth no matter which type of tire you have. Solid construction. I love that the knobs are real rubber sweet upgrade to the previous version.
customer_reviews.author: Bigdaddy

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet trainer.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband for Christmas. He loves it and has already ridden over 100 miles on it. It's super quiet and dosent wake our toddler sleeping in the next room. It was easy to put together and easy to take the bike on and off of. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: J. Newsome

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, and work as advertised. Gives me a good work out. I had cyclops before. This is better in my opinion. Really sturdy, and less noisy.
customer_reviews.author: Hsin H Lee

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was worried it would hold up to my weight. At 410 pounds I thought the mounts might bend. It has held up fine. My problem is I get bored riding, even with the TV on.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dunston

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is meant to
customer_reviews.text: A little on the loud side but I listen to music so it’s no problem It works like I expected. Worth it
customer_reviews.author: Laura L.

customer_reviews.title: but I love the easy of use
customer_reviews.text: Don't have any experience to compare with other trainers, but I love the easy of use, workmanship and quality of this trainer.

customer_reviews.title: Works fantastic! Low noise and low vibration
customer_reviews.text: Trainer arrived fast. Works fantastic! Low noise and low vibration.

customer_reviews.title: Get it now!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic piece of equipment. The Road Machine smoother, quieter and gives a better overall workout than any of the other 3 trainers I have. At the current sale price it is a GREAT buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kinglong1

customer_reviews.title: so far so good. didn't get the Bluetooth add on but web ...
customer_reviews.text: put 180 miles on her so far. so far so good. didn't get the Bluetooth add on but web sight has a formula to convert mph to watts. remember to turn on your fan(s) you'll warm right up cranking on this machine.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mid-priced product that works very well with hardly any noise. I am not a riding pro. I just bought this to be able to exercise indoors while watching TV during inclement weather. Love it!

customer_reviews.text: amazxing product, very well build, good quality and good for training. Just remember to look at the additional disk! it will make your training almost with the same resistance as a real road.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a year ago. Use it everyday. Worth the money. Very quiet. Very good quality.

customer_reviews.text: my wife and I absolutely love this trainer, great for riding when the weather is bad and times when its just quick and convenient to ride at home. Use it with TV and training videos ..that makes its fun!

customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and use. Quiet enough to watch TV while I'm spinning. Perfect to be able to get some practice after my son goes to sleep.

customer_reviews.text: not as smooth a ride as I thought it would be but gets the job done.

customer_reviews.text: Imagine quietly spinning down a country road on a warm spring morning. Only difference? It's winter and you're watching Sports Center!! (At just a slightly louder volume) This sweet quiet ride is worth the investment. Couldn't be happier. Quiet, storable, and a real road feel.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this purchase. Had waited a long time to finally get a trainer and this one is terrific. Noise is definitely minimal. As others have said, important to note that a rear skewer does come with the trainer. Not clear from item description. Also bought the riser and the mat from this company and am very pleased with both.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Heckin
customer_reviews.text: Very nice trainer. Smooth. Quiet. The skewer tensioner knob really bamboozled me for a min as the housing is recessed where my stock skewer tightens down.... the instructions were mediocre for such an expensive item.....wish I could use the inRide, but I don't have an Iphone.
customer_reviews.author: M  Manor

customer_reviews.title: I love it. It's very
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It's very, very well made--should last for years. I've had no issues with slipping, but it's early days yet. If the tire should ever start slipping, I can just adjust the setting so the tire is closer to the roller. I'm a mechanical dunce, so I found it very helpful to watch at least two of the videos about how to put the bike on--I needed to watch one about the skewer, and a different one about the left/right and tire-to-roller adjustments. By following those instructions, I've had zero problems. Now I can get on first thing in the morning for just a bit, and hop on late at night, even when it's raining.
customer_reviews.author: Runner/Cyclist

customer_reviews.title: Very good, solid choice for a non-smart trainer.
customer_reviews.text: The trainer is very well built, and well finished (painted). It is just big and heavy enough that it doesn't move around, but without being too cumbersome to move when folded. The noise level is pretty reasonable, no louder than the drivetrain noise or the noise of the fan I use to keep cool. While it might not offer all of the fancy features of the newest line of smart trainers, it seems like it is much better built (and will last much longer) than some of the mid-range smart trainers from Elite and Tacx (also, it won't really become obsolete).

product_meta.title: Kinetic Road Machine 2.0 Fluid Trainer
product_meta.description:
The best combination of value and performance in fluid bike trainers. Quiet, smooth, and 100% leak-proof, the Road Machine is the perfect platform for all of your workout plans, from threshold and interval work to recovery spins. You'll get genuine real-road feel in the saddle thanks to our large fly wheel and precision-calibrated fluid resistance unit and the added peace of mind from the industry's best warranty. 

The Kinetic Road Machine is compatible with the Kinetic Fit power training app when paired with the optional Kinetic inRide Watt Meter.
feature_bullets: Quiet, smooth, progressive resistance precisely replicates outdoor ride feel
The most reliable fluid trainer available. 6.25 pound flywheel for superior ride feel
Fully assembled.Frame fits 22 inch to 29 inch wheels
Pairs with Kinetic inRide Watt Meter for power training.Unmatched stability and durability with a lifetime warranty
NOT compatible with Pro Flywheel accessory
